vyavasyāmy aham ekaikasminn apāye 'parāntakoṭīgatān kalpān saṃvasayituṃ /  yathā ca ekāpāye tathā sarvāpāyaniravaśeṣasarvalokadhātuparyāpanneṣu sarvasatvaparimocananidānaṃ /
